players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I investigated Charlie and they are mafia. We must vote them out today."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Bob, he is mafia. Alice is lying to save her partner."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and my investigation proves he is mafia. Vote Charlie to win the game."
Charlie: "Alice is clearly the mafioso trying to frame me. I investigated Bob last night and he's clean. Vote Alice to save the town."
Bob: "I am innocent and I believe Alice is the mafioso. Charlie's investigation proves my innocence, so let's vote for Alice to clear my name."
